description: This file defines API endpoints for managing 'clients' in a project management backend. It includes CRUD operations such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting client records, utilizing FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: ClientResponse _to_client_response(client: Client)
methods.description: Converts a SQLAlchemy Client ORM object into a ClientResponse Pydantic schema for API responses.

methods.name: list[ClientResponse] list_clients( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), q: str | None = Query(None, description="Optional search query (matches name/company/email)."), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Page size."), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list the current user's clients, with optional search and pagination.

methods.name: ClientResponse get_client( client_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific client by ID for the current user.

methods.name: ClientResponse create_client( payload: ClientCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new client owned by the current user.

methods.name: ClientResponse update_client( client_id: uuid.UUID, payload: ClientUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing client's details for the current user.

methods.name: Response delete_client( client_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a client belonging to the current user.

ctags.name: create_client
ctags.signature: ( payload: ClientCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: delete_client
ctags.signature: ( client_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_client
ctags.signature: ( client_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_clients
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), q: str | None = Query(None, description="Optional search query (matches name/company/email)."), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Page size."), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination."), )

ctags.name: update_client
ctags.signature: ( client_id: uuid.UUID, payload: ClientUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
